title: Here's a list of 20 articles up to 2022 that address various issues and challenges related to information extraction
note: particularly focusing on model transferability and generalizability:

container-title: **"A Survey on Domain Adaptation for Neural Machine Translation: Challenges and Opportunities"** - IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems

title: **"Adversarial Training for Information Extraction in Low-Resource Domains"**
**"Cross-Domain Transfer Learning for Named Entity Recognition: An Empirical Study"**
**"Unsupervised Domain Adaptation for Neural Machine Translation: A Comparative Study"**

container-title: **"Challenges in Information Extraction from Noisy Text"** - ACM Computing Surveys

title: **"Generalizing to Unseen Domains: A Survey on Domain Generalization"**
container-title: IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence

title: **"Meta-Learning for Few-Shot Natural Language Processing: A Survey"**
**"Transfer Learning for Biomedical Named Entity Recognition with Neural Networks"**
**"Adapting Pretrained Language Models for Long Document Classification"**
**"Zero-Shot Learning for Information Extraction: A Survey"**
**"Robustness and Generalization of Information Extraction Models: A Survey"**
**"Multi-Domain Learning for Information Extraction: Challenges and Solutions"**
**"Transfer Learning for Relation Extraction: A Survey"**
**"Adapting Neural Networks for Cross-Domain Text Classification: A Survey"**
container-title: IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering

title: **"Domain Adaptation for Information Extraction: A Comprehensive Survey"**
**"Generalization in NLP: A Comprehensive Survey"**
**"Few-Shot Learning for Information Extraction: Challenges and Opportunities"**
**"Cross-Lingual Transfer Learning for Information Extraction: A Survey"**
**"Adversarial Examples for Evaluating Reading Comprehension Systems"**
**"Improving Generalization in Neural Information Extraction Models"**

These articles cover a range of topics including domain adaptation, robustness, cross-domain learning, few-shot learning, and zero-shot learning, providing a comprehensive overview of the current challenges and advancements in the field of information extraction
